org.vngx.jsch.kex

Class DiffieHellmanImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vngx.jsch.kex.DiffieHellmanImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, DiffieHellman

    public final class DiffieHellmanImpl
extends Object
implements DiffieHellman
    Implementation of DiffieHellman using the implementation provided through JCE.
    Author:
    Michael Laudati
    See Also:
    org.vngx.jsch.DiffieHellman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiffieHellmanImpl()
      Creates a new instance of DiffieHellmanImpl.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getE()
      Returns 'e' the exchange value sent from client calculated by e = g^x mod p (and x is a random number (1 < x < (p-1)/2))/
      byte[] getK()
      Returns the shared secret key calculated by K = f^x mod p.
      void setF(byte[] f)
      Sets 'f' the exchange value sent by the server after receiving 'e' calculated by f = g^y mod p (and y (0 < y < q).
      void setG(byte[] g)
      Sets the public base for D-H key exchange.
      void setP(byte[] p)
      Sets the public (prime) number for D-H key exchange.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Creates a new instance of DiffieHellmanImpl.

        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if DH algorithm cannot be found
        NoSuchProviderException - if default provider cannot be found
